author: perezhilton
title: Kerry Washington Gets Political On The SAG Awards Red Carpet! | CocoPerez.com
text:
Kerry Washington made her arrival count!
The stunning starlet was covered in crystals, pearls, and sequins for the SAG Awards red carpet on Sunday, and yet, she still didn't manage to blow us away!
Kerry opted for a leopard-print Cavalli Couture gown, which didn't really do much for her enviable figure.
At least her sleek hair and smoldering makeup were on point??
And even though we weren't in love with her outfit, Miz Washington also donned a safety pin in solidarity of our "fellow citizens and human beings". See the Instagram pic (below):
